posts.title: The One With All The Recommendations
posts.text: It's been almost 27 years since 'Friends' premiered and now they're getting back together for a reunion. To celebrate, we have a few literary recommendations for each character.

posts.title: The New York Public Library and WNET Summer Reading Segment
posts.text: The New York Public Library is looking for children to participate in a special television opportunity!

posts.title: NYPL Presents: Tarot Reading Recommendations
posts.text: Patience thought Halloween would be the perfect time to demonstrate the art of reading Tarot—all while offering some reading recommendations.

posts.title: The Only Titles that Should Matter to the Game of Thrones Characters
posts.text: To bid adieu and bide our time until the final Game of Thrones book, we’ve rounded up some literary recommendations for the characters of Westeros. Book club, anyone?

posts.title: Digital Stylist: New Year's Eve Edition
posts.text: Whatever your plans for New Year's celebrations may be, the NYPL Digital Collections will have some sartorial inspiration for you.

posts.title: Brewing Up Some History for #NationalBeerDay
posts.text: In honor of National Beer Day we've poured through our Digital Collections to find some frothy content that’ll be sure to put a smile on your mug.

posts.title: The Festive Past of New Year's Menus
posts.text: With approximately 45,000 menus dating from the 1840s to the present, The New York Public Library’s restaurant menu collection is one of the largest in the world. In anticipation of 2018, we combed through the archives to find some of the most festive menus fêteing the new years of yore!

posts.title: NYPL's 2017 NYC Neighborhood Library Awards Winners
posts.text: Congratulations to all the NYPL branches honored at this year's NYC Neighborhood Library Awards!

posts.title: Digital Stylist: Tony Awards Edition
posts.text: In advance of Broadway’s biggest night, the Tony Awards, we dove into our Digital Collections to play fashion consultant for a few of the nominees.

posts.title: Digital Stylist: Oscars Edition
posts.text: In advance of Oscar Sunday, we dove into our Digital Collections to play fashion consultant for some of the nominees for the 89th Academy Awards. Using the Creators Studio images from our Art and Picture Collection, we’ve chosen a specific look for each of the amazing Best and Supporting Actress nominees.
